content: k7 ssk k1 turn row 5 ws s1 p8 p2tog p1 turn for 64 st sock row 6 rs s1 k9 ssk k1 turn row 13 ws - s1 p16 p2tog turn row 7 ws s1 p10 p2tog p1 turn row 14 rs - s1 k16 ssk 18 heel sts remaining row 8 rs s1 k11 ssk k1 turn begin gusset row 9 ws s1 p12 p2tog p1 turn row 10 rs s1 k13 ssk k1 turn for 72 st sock row 11 ws s1 p14 p2tog p1 turn row 13 ws - s1 p16 p2tog p1 turn row 12 rs s1 k15 ssk k1 turn row 14 rs - s1 k17 ssk k1 turn row 15 ws - s1 p18 p2tog turn row 16 rs - s1 k18 ssk 20 heel sts remaining begin gusset option 2 if using a cc for heel flap/turn change back to mc after completing heel turn as you pick up gusset stitches this is a good method if using self-striping yarn gusset now you will transition back to working in the round continue from the heel sts to pick up and knit 16 17 19 sts along slip_stitch edge plus 2 additional sts between the heel flap and instep sts to prevent a hole from forming for a total of 18 19 21 sts picked up k across instep sts front needle on the back needle pick up and knit the same total amount of sts to match previous side 18 19 21 k8 9 10 pm the middle of the heel is now the new beginning of the round if knitting magic loop you should have 52 56 62 heel+gusset stitches on the back needle and 30 32 36 instep sts on the front needle knit 1 round plain © crazypennygirl designs for personal use only questions email beth at crazypennygirl@hotmail com page 2 decrease round k to 3 sts before the end of the heel sts back needle k2tog k1 k across all instep sts front needle k1 ssk k to end of round knit round k all sts continue working alternating between decrease and knit rounds until you have 30 32 36 heel sts remaining on the back needle the gusset decreases are now complete remove the beginning of round marker at the middle of the heel and k to the end of the heel sts back needle this is the new beginning of round foot k all stitches until foot measures 1 5 inches less than desired length when measured from the heel turn my foot is 9-1/4 long us women s size 8 5 so i knit the foot of my socks until they are approximately 7-1/4 to 7-1/2 from the heel turn approximately 65 rounds toe if using cc for toe change to cc now round 1 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1* repeat between * for back needle rounds 2-4 knit round 5 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before
